ThingDef.label: Tac-Kek Fast MT
ThingDef.description: "A non-ballistic replica of the Ops-Core Fast helmet from Tac-Kek."

ThingDef.label: Tac-Kek Fast MT Mando
ThingDef.description: "A non-ballistic replica of the Ops-Core Fast helmet from Tac-Kek."

ThingDef.label: Kolpak-1S Riot Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Kolpak-1S protects the head from the cold piercing-cutting weapons in a special class of protection GOST R50744-95, from fragmentation with an energy of impact up to 50 J."

ThingDef.label: Kolpak-1S Riot Helmet(Visor)
ThingDef.description: "Kolpak-1S protects the head from the cold piercing-cutting weapons in a special class of protection GOST R50744-95, from fragmentation with an energy of impact up to 50 J."

ThingDef.label: UNTAR Helmet
ThingDef.description: "The standard issue helmet of the UNTAR mission in Tarkov."

ThingDef.label: 6B47 Ratnik-BSh Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Main Ballistic helmet of a Russian army. Comes in green and with flora digital cover."

ThingDef.label: LZSh light Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Lightweight protective helmet made in Russia. In fact the copy of Ops-core Fast helmet, but with lower characteristics."

ThingDef.label: SSh-68 helmet
ThingDef.description: "The SSh-68 replaced the general-army SSh-60 helmet. It differs from its predecessor in greater durability, a large inclination of the front part and short side boards."

ThingDef.label: Kiver-M Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Ballistic helmet."

ThingDef.label: Kiver-M Helmet(Visor)
ThingDef.description: "Ballistic helmet."

ThingDef.label: SSSh-95 Sfera-S
ThingDef.description: "Special helmet with modular protection done with thickened armored steel. Used by special forces of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation."

ThingDef.label: MSA TC-800 Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Ballistic helmet MSA TC 800, designed for use by tactical teams of police special forces, in combat and reconnaissance operations. It can be modified by various components."

ThingDef.label: Highcom Striker ACHHC Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Highcom combat helmet without additional mounts. "High Cut" version. Comes in black and olive."

ThingDef.label: ZSh-1-2M Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Helmet ZSh-1-2M consists of a durable alloy, covered from the inside by aramid fabrics, which does not allow to penetrate the protective layer and absorbs the dynamic impact of bullets or shrapnel."

ThingDef.label: ZSh-1-2M Helmet(Visor)
ThingDef.description: "Helmet ZSh-1-2M consists of a durable alloy, covered from the inside by aramid fabrics, which does not allow to penetrate the protective layer and absorbs the dynamic impact of bullets or shrapnel."

ThingDef.label: Highcom Striker ULACH Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Combat helmet from Highcom company with the ears and back of the head protection. No additional mounts. Comes in black and coyote tan."

ThingDef.label: Ops-Core Fast MT Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Comes in black and tan."

ThingDef.label: Ops-Core Fast MT Helmet(Visor)
ThingDef.description: "Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Comes in black and tan."

ThingDef.label: Ops-Core Fast MT Mando Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Comes in black and tan."

ThingDef.label: Ops-Core Fast MT Mod Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Comes in black and tan."

ThingDef.label: Ops-Core Fast MT Full Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Comes in black and tan."

ThingDef.label: BNTI LSHZ-2DTM Helmet
ThingDef.description: "The helmet "LSHZ-2DTM" is intended for periodic wearing with the purpose of protection from bullets of small arms of a person’s head, as well as for protection from bullets of small arms of a person’s face and neck when picking up a product with a visor and aventail."

ThingDef.label: BNTI LSHZ-2DTM Helmet(Visor)
ThingDef.description: "The helmet "LSHZ-2DTM" is intended for periodic wearing with the purpose of protection from bullets of small arms of a person’s head, as well as for protection from bullets of small arms of a person’s face and neck when picking up a product with a visor and aventail."

ThingDef.label: BNTI LSHZ-2DTM Helmet(Visor and Aventail)
ThingDef.description: "The helmet "LSHZ-2DTM" is intended for periodic wearing with the purpose of protection from bullets of small arms of a person’s head, as well as for protection from bullets of small arms of a person’s face and neck when picking up a product with a visor and aventail."

ThingDef.label: Maska 1Sch Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Protective helmet "Maska-1" appeared in service in 1991, as a replacement for the "Sphere" helmet."

ThingDef.label: Maska 1Sch Helmet(Face Shield)
ThingDef.description: "Protective helmet "Maska-1" appeared in service in 1991, as a replacement for the "Sphere" helmet."

ThingDef.label: Altyn Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Altyn" passed real combat tests in Afghanistan and Chechnya and is still in service with the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation and the army special forces. The installation of an armored visor shield is possible.

ThingDef.label: Altyn Helmet(Face Shield)
ThingDef.description: "Altyn" passed real combat tests in Afghanistan and Chechnya and is still in service with the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation and the army special forces. The installation of an armored visor shield is possible.

ThingDef.label: Rys-T Helmet
ThingDef.description: "The "Rys-T" (Lynx-T) armored helmet is an improved and lightweight version of the famous Altyn helmet. It is in service with the assault units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia. Installation of an special armored visor is possible."

ThingDef.label: Rys-T Helmet(Face Shield)
ThingDef.description: "The "Rys-T" (Lynx-T) armored helmet is an improved and lightweight version of the famous Altyn helmet. It is in service with the assault units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia. Installation of an special armored visor is possible."

ThingDef.label: Vulkan-5 heavy Helmet
ThingDef.description: "Heavy helmet with a high level of protection "Vulkan-5" is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 6-class head protection from medium to heavy projectiles."

ThingDef.label: Vulkan-5 heavy Helmet(Visor)
ThingDef.description: "Heavy helmet with a high level of protection "Vulkan-5" is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 6-class head protection from medium to heavy projectiles."
